ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ToSME__c = true, OR( CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@outlook.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@outlook.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@outlook.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@orange.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@orange.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@orange.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@yahoo.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@yahoo.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@yahoo.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@aol.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@aol.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@aol.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@icloud.com'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@icloud.com'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@icloud.com'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@mac.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@mac.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@mac.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@hotmail.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@hotmail.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@hotmail.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@t-online.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@t-online.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@t-online.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@gmail.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@gmail.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@gmail.'),
CONTAINS(ToAddress,'@gmx.'), CONTAINS(BccAddress,'@gmx.'), CONTAINS(CcAddress,'@gmx.') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You try to send an e-mail to a customer (gmail, hotmail, free ... adress) and not to the SME (Maison's adress). Please look carefully at your recipient.
